c74object.name: fl.frommax~
c74object.digest: Turn messages or control signals from the host into frames.
c74object.description: In values mode the output is the last received value(s) as a vector. In params mode messages are collected and output as a single tagged frame. Typically params mode is used to help set object parameters. Output is triggered by frames arriving at the trigger input.

entry.name: 1. /mode [instantiation enum]
entry.description:
Sets the mode:
values - translate values from the host into vectors.
params - translate host messages into concatenated tagged frames.
[0] - values [1] - params
